extension.searchTitle: To prohibit the application of certain restrictive eligibility requirements to foreign nongovernmental organizations with respect to the provision of assistance under part I of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.; Global Democracy Promotion Act;H.R. 2738 (IH)

titleInfo.title: To prohibit the application of certain restrictive eligibility requirements to foreign nongovernmental organizations with respect to the provision of assistance under part I of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

name.namePart: Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico
